name: Kael the Crimson
long_description: The mage wears red robes and radiates an aura of power and confidence. He has flowing white hair and a long white beard, though his face does not appear to show the age he would have to be to have such. Tatooed upon his right forearm is a crimson sigil which looks like a crecent moon.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome, seeker of arcane knowledge. What magical wares interest you?
dialogue.default: These items are imbued with powerful enchantments. Handle them with care.
dialogue.goodbye: May the weave guide you safely.
